mapper.select: SELECT siu.*, s.*, ac.store_ceo FROM STORE_INFO_UPDATE siu LEFT JOIN STORE s ON siu.store_idx = s.store_idx LEFT JOIN STORE_ACCOUNT ac ON s.store_idx = ac.store_idx where siu.su_name != s.store_name OR siu.su_name != '' OR siu.su_tel != s.store_tel OR siu.su_tel != '' OR siu.su_addr != s.store_addr OR siu.su_addr != '' OR siu.su_daddr != s.store_daddr OR siu.su_daddr != '' OR siu.su_ceo != ac.store_ceo OR siu.su_ceo != ''
